subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Five teams — the Bulls, the Heat, the Knicks, the Nets and the Clippers — will head to Ohio beginning Thursday to try to lure LeBron James, but it appears he may be leaning toward Chicago.
snippet: Five teams — the Bulls, the Heat, the Knicks, the Nets and the Clippers — will head to Ohio beginning Thursday to try to lure LeBron James, but it appears he may be leaning toward Chicago.
